content: परुष {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [पॄ-उषन्] {@--1@} Hard, rough, rugged, stiff (<ab>opp.</ab> मृदु or श्लक्ष्ण); परुषं चर्म, परुषा माला &c. {@--2@} Harsh, abusive, severe, unkind, cruel, stern (as words); (वाक्) अपरुषा परुषाक्षरमीरिता <ls>R. 9. 8</ls>; <ls>Pt. 1. 50</ls>; said also of a person; स्निग्धे यत्परुषासि <ls>Gīt. 9</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 310.</ls> {@--3@} Harsh or disagreeable to the ear (as a sound &c.); तेन वज्रपरुषस्वनं धनुः <ls>R. 11. 46</ls>; <ls>Me. 61.</ls> {@--4@} Rough, coarse, rough to the touch, shaggy (as hair); शुद्धस्नानात्परुषमलकं <ls>Me. 91.</ls> {@--5@} Sharp, violent, strong, keen, piercing (wind &c.); परुषपवनवेगोत्क्षिप्तसंशुष्कपर्णः <ls>Rs. 1. 22</ls>; <ls n="Rs.">2. 28.</ls> {@--6@} Gross. {@--7@} Dirty. {@--8@} Spotted, variegated. {@--9@} <ab>Ved.</ab> Knotted. --षं A harsh or abusive speech, abuse.
